content.text:
# Screen Award for Best Child Artist

The [http://www.expressindia.com/latest-news/bScreen-awards-Cinemas-finest-fill-the-night-b/260346/ Screen Award for Best Child Artist] is a new award conducted by the Star Screen Awards to recognise a great performance by a child actor in the previous year.
Winners
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|- bgcolor="#d1e4fd"
! Year || Actor || Film
|-
| 1998 || Kunal Khemu || Zakhm
|-
| 2006 || Ayesha Kapur || Black
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2008 || Darsheel Safary || Taare Zameen Par (Like Stars on Earth)
|-
| 2009 || Purav Bhandare || Tahaan
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2010 || Pratik Katare || Paa
|-
| 2011 || Ayaan Barodia || Udaan
|- bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2012 || Partho Gupte || Stanley Ka Dabba
|-
| 2013 || Mohammad Samad || Gattu
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2014 || Japtej Singh || Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
|-
| 2014 || Parth Bhalerao || Bhoothnath Returns
|-
| 2015 || Harshaali Malhotra || Bajrangi Bhaijaan
|-
| 2016 || Riya Shukla || Nil Battey Sannata
|}
Notes
See also
* Screen Awards
